content: The Yamuna River at New Delhi, India, is a collection of 18 drains flowing into it, carrying a toxic cocktail of sewage, chemicals, detergents, and industrial waste. Less than 10% of sewage discharged into the river is treated. A froth of foam from the pollution makes for surreal photographs which belie the seriousness of the situation__no.0361, 2019.  #waterpollution #watercontamination #toxicwaters #toxicchemicals #publichealthrisk #industrialwaste
